itemDescription: Naval historian, marine painter, Royal Marines officer (1790-1860)

wikipedia_page.main: Paul Harris Nicolas (1 March 1790 – 1 May 1860) was a nineteenth-century British historian, an accomplished, if little known, water colourist, a Royal Marines officer, and a veteran of the Battle of Trafalgar. Nicolas was the author of the two volume Historical Record of the Royal Marine Forces.
